text: inya wede nuhina kerisu behwala wede neberuti nebiyati inidaweredini wede anitemi aweredini፡፡ wede ibirahimimi፣ wede isima‘ilimi፣ wede isihak’imi፣ wede ya‘ik’obimi፣ wede negedochumi፣ wede ‘isami፣ wede ayubimi፣ wede yunusimi፣ wede harunina፣ wede suleyimanimi aweredini፡፡ ledawidimi zeburini set’enewi፡፡
